group_1.textLeft: (It's no surprise she was having trouble...)

group_1.textRight: Um. Err… Thank you!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@[chara:200500:motion_100]Oh of course, it was my pleasure.
Are you…a Magical Girl from this city?

group_1.textRight: Er...@Yep, I am.
Hey, wait!@[chara:100900:motion_400]Are you doubting me?!
Is it because I almost got beat up@back there?!
No!@That's not what was happening!
The Witches in Kamihama are stronger@than other Witches. That's what they say...
Usually I have no problem, but...
I've beaten…so many@of them before, y'know!
So I'm the real deal!@[chara:100900:motion_201:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_060.exp.json]A real Magical Girl from Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: So this...@This is Kamihama City, then?

group_1.textRight: Uh...@Yeah it is...

group_1.textLeft: I was wandering about searching for magic.
I guess I crossed the border @into this city without realizing it.
I'd heard the name before…@So this is Kamihama City.

group_1.textRight: What?!@What're you talking about?
Does that mean you're not from around here?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's right.@My territory is in another city.

group_1.textRight: Wait, what?@That's so much more embarrassing!
I can't believe I was saved by an outsider!

group_1.textLeft: No need to beat yourself up.

group_1.textRight: Today was just...bad timing or something...
I've made it as a Magical Girl@here for ages, so…
I'm not stupid. I don't usually@fight Witches alone like that.
If I had the others like usual…

group_1.textLeft: So you normally have friends with you.

group_1.textRight: Huh?[chara:100900:motion_0]@Er... Yeah[chara:100900:lipSynch_0].
Oh...@B-but!
I can do it by myself too, y'know!@I can beat a single Witch.
I just wasn't feeling my best today!

group_1.textLeft: Of course you can.@That last attack was quite strong.
I can tell you're an excellent@Magical Girl.
That one blow made that clear.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!@I[chara:100900:lipSynch_0]...
(Hearing her say that makes@me feel even more lame…)
(What the heck?@How's she so calm?)
